a new year begins (idiom)
abundant harvest of all food crops/bumper grain harvest
display of fireworks and lanterns
bridal room and ornamented candles/wedding festivities (idiom)
(literary) to practice medicine/to work as a pharmacist
old but still full of vitality (idiom)
feast/celebration
profits pouring in from all sides (idiom)/raking in money/bonanza
to praise/well done, bravo!
to gallop/to spur on a horse/to let one's steed have his head
millions of people all of one mind (idiom); the people united

lit. (may you) have abundance year after year/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
